column2: Sindhi:مورو) is a city in the Naushahro Feroze District
column4: Pakistan. The city is administratively subdivided into 12 Union councils. and is located in the centre of Sindh at an altitude of 28 m (95 ft) and is 12 km of the Indus River. It is the largest city in Naushahro Feroze District with a population of about 368
